Reviews.Title: Works Just Like It's Supposed To
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: These cameras have fooled everyone that has seen them, and they are a great deterrent. Was surprised at the quality and effectiveness of this dummy camera. If placed where no one can question it, it works great. Best buy on the web, bar none.

Reviews.Title: As An Add-on to Real System
Reviews.Author: M. Dees "repair-bad-credit-fast dot com"
Reviews.Content: Be aware that they are a bit of a Chinese puzzle to open for battery installation. You have to turn the base counter clockwise to release the ball (the part that looks like the camera), being careful not to drop the ball. Then you have to do the same with the ball to open the battery compartment - and be careful when opening the ball! Two thin battery wires attach the two halves. Break one and you'll need to do a soldering job.Plan on finding a few screws to replace those provided for mounting. They are made of some type of hardened butter substance that strip out if you meet any resistance when mounting the camera. No big deal, though. I found replacements easily enough in my junk drawer (who doesn't keep a collection of "just-in-case" screws, nuts, and bolts?).I purchased 2 of these fakes to be used as an enhancement to a real 24/7 DVR system I previously installed. These fakes were placed in areas that were "blind" to my recorder because my 4 camera system couldn't provide 100% coverage of my home. I placed my real cameras to cover vital areas of my property and used these fakes to cover the remaining, but non-critical areas.I'm still undecided about the blinking red light. Personally, I'd prefer a constantly lit light that would more closely resemble a real Infra-Red working camera. However, The blinking light does get the attention of potential thieves who would undoubtedly take a second look before proceeding further and likely see my real cameras.As far as my neighbors know, every camera is real (they saw me installing the real system) and this is the key to using fakes.1. NEVER reveal to anyone which cameras are fake. A trusted neighbor may have a friend or family member who is a thief.2. Placement should be out of reach and at a height that would prevent a close visual inspection.3. They should never be used as the only "security" method for a home, but in conjunction with a real surveillance system.I purchased mine when they were 4 dollars each and though I see now (at the time of this review) they have increased more than 60% in price, they are still cheaper than other similar fakes and I still recommend them.

Reviews.Title: Great works as expected
Reviews.Author: Sincere
Reviews.Content: for the price it worked as it should my neighbors thought it was real i love it worth it if you want an cheap alternative deterrent

Reviews.Title: OK for the money
Reviews.Author: Richard k Rose
Reviews.Content: Everyone knows this is a fake camera so and think this is the only one. My real camera captured images of the thief, a neighbor, who now sits in jail.It eats batteries, one a month.

Reviews.Title: Looks Very Real!
Reviews.Author: M. Ligman
Reviews.Content: I love it for what it is but there is not too much to say about this product, other than it really does look real! It would fool me if I didn't know better. It's great for what it is, but I think my next security purchase would be a real one. Once someone knows it's a fake, it's useless.

Reviews.Title: Came here to order a second one!
Reviews.Author: David "ARTSi Gallery"
Reviews.Content: Looks really good and realistic. Easy to install with convenient cut out template. Confident this will discourage most would-be intruders. Only thing I would change is included warning sticker is OK but I would remove www.videosecu.com in order to keep it more generic and anonymous since the whole purpose is to put doubts in people's mind. So I ended up not using included sticker. Other than that very happy I chose this model over others that seem cheesy and fake.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Jerry N.
Reviews.Content: It looks real mounts real easy and adjust to the exact location that you want it to aim, just curious how long the batteries will last

Reviews.Title: Looks cool.
Reviews.Author: little miss moonlight
Reviews.Content: Very light and I guess real looking.  The only down part is that it says "VideoSecu" on it... may be a give-away to others knowing about this brand.

Reviews.Title: Great Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Caballo "Jorge"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product with the idea of fixing a permanent problem with a temporary solution. It was good. The batteries last about 2 months and you have to be on top of it making sure the light it's on. I end up buying a real monitoring system but for the time I utilized this product, it fit the purpose . Will not recommended for exterior, specially if you live by the coast due to the corrosion eats the wires quickly.

Reviews.Title: Kills batteries quickly
Reviews.Author: Eugene
Reviews.Content: This is a battery killer. The flashing red light is very bright, and flashes very often. I think that's why the battery only lasted a few weeks before dying. I ordered several of these and installed them all at the same time, with fresh batteries. They all died at the same time, as well.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: Harold JONES
Reviews.Content: IT DOES EVERYTHING IT WAS ADVERTISED TO DO. WE HAVE BEEN VERY PLEASED WITH IT SO FAR. LOOKS REALISTIC. MIGHT BUY ANOTHER ONE

Reviews.Title: Product not good
Reviews.Author: John R Hamlin
Reviews.Content: The battery only last about 2 weeks. I was very surprised. Replacing a battery that often makes this product a poor purchase.

Reviews.Title: Not a prudent purchase
Reviews.Author: Lonnie Chase
Reviews.Content: I have had the unit for less than 60 days and I have had to replace the batteries for the 3rd time.  You have to replace the batteries every 20 days.

Reviews.Title: looks fake
Reviews.Author: Linnea
Reviews.Content: I'm using it but I doubt it is fooling anybody.  It's slightly bigger than I expected and the "infrared" light is just a bright red light.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: pedro marinkovic
Reviews.Content: I liked, is a good product,. look very real, and excellent price. This Surveillance Security Camera is a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Fooled my neighbors
Reviews.Author: Mike Cafiero
Reviews.Content: For the price you cant go wrong for these autehntic dummy cameras. I would highly reccomned to anyone looking to deter crooks.

Reviews.Title: Good enough from far away.
Reviews.Author: craig segien
Reviews.Content: For a dummy camera they were cheap and got the job done.  However, if a burglar looked closely they would be able to tell it's a dummy.  Great for deterrence though.

Reviews.Title: Good buy!
Reviews.Author: Dr. Albert S. Ferguson
Reviews.Content: This is a good buy and it measures up to all of its advertisement.Bravo.  Identical look to like items installed elsewhere.Doc

Reviews.Title: Neat product.
Reviews.Author: Ronald Lloveras
Reviews.Content: Bought it to deter anyone from trying to steal shipped packages from our front porch. Looks like the real thing so I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Thwart the dummies
Reviews.Author: Tania Chavez
Reviews.Content: Thwart the dummies who try to come steal your shizzit.  It's your shizzit, after all.  You don't want the dummies to come get it, again.

Reviews.Title: Realistic
Reviews.Author: Damifino
Reviews.Content: You really cant tell this is a dummy. Keeps the uninvited 'guests' on their toes. The blinking light and sticker completes the look.

Reviews.Title: Looks reasonably authentic - well worthwhile
Reviews.Author: The Kodachromeguy
Reviews.Content: I installed it on the porch roof facing the side door and put up the "video" sign.  I am not sure if it would fool all potential crooks, but if it scares even one away from the house, it is well worth the low cost.

Reviews.Title: good dummy cam
Reviews.Author: Joe User
Reviews.Content: This cam works well at our entryway to deter criminals. The cam can be pivoted and rotated. the battery compartment is a little tricky to access in that I felt I was going to break the camera. Other than that it's a good way to suppliment your existing video security. It looks extremely real.

Reviews.Title: Don't use red light, could use a real sticker
Reviews.Author: J. Smith "jaydge"
Reviews.Content: As other reviewers have pointed out, most real security cameras don't have red blinking lights (or any lights.) So I'd keep the lights off by just not installing batteries.Compare this fake to the same maker's REAL camera:http://www.amazon.com/VideoSecu-Vision-Outdoor-Security-Vandal-proof/dp/B000TGC03U/ref=sr_1_21?ie=UTF8&qid;=1360006518&sr;=8-21It looks just about the same but I notice the real one has a silver label on the front with model number, etc. where the fake just has a logo. It would be nice if they included a real label from a different product on the fake camera as well.Also the camera lens is noticeably different but I don't think potential thieves would inspect it that closely. The sticker would go a long way though in convincing people it's a real camera.If you have a little more to spend, but you just aren't going to invest in a real system, it may be worth paying $30-$60 for a real one of these instead, just to leave it disconnected. You can't get any more real than the real thing after all.I ended up going with a fake VideoSecu dome camera instead because it has no noticeable difference between its real counterpart that I could tell:Real: http://www.amazon.com/VideoSecu-Security-Camera-Built--Surveillance/dp/B000OK22AW/ref=sr_1_6?s=electronics&ie;=UTF8&qid;=1360006776&sr;=1-6Fake: http://www.amazon.com/VideoSecu-Imitation-Security-Cost-effective-Simulated/dp/B003XTTIIK/ref=sr_1_3?s=electronics&ie;=UTF8&qid;=1360006769&sr;=1-3

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: meisterious
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Looks real, solid build.  Super easy to apply.  This is higher quality than other similar dummy cameras that are out there.

Reviews.Title: Nice looking, arrived quickly and we are very satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Gary J. Assetto
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing, nice product.  Arrived quickly and was packaged nicely.  Would definately order again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a real camera.
Reviews.Author: Darkwave Fan
Reviews.Content: This is a very passable fake.  I would be fooled by it, If I saw it on a wall or ceiling.  I'm using fake cameras like these to provide the visible deterrent that my hidden cameras don't.  The also function as a decoy, for anyone who decides to smash my video cameras.  Replacing one of these is a lot cheaper then replacing a real camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool
Reviews.Author: Ryan23
Reviews.Content: I would have preferred and on/off switch for the light or a longer pause between flashes, but these are great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Meets the need
Reviews.Author: Daniel M. Clawson
Reviews.Content: quality for price.  Worth the effort.  We installed and they have been operating perfectly. Mix with actual cameras for maximum effect.

Reviews.Title: Blends well!
Reviews.Author: Fineresume
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product to add to my existing system. At first, you would have to get over the fact that you know its not real. But, the components are of a high quality plastic and once I installed it, it blended with my other 'real' surveillance cameras.

Reviews.Title: It is good but the mail was very...very expensive
Reviews.Author: CHIWIN
Reviews.Content: It is good but the mail was very...very expensiveI and out of normal.  It works good with some internal adjustement in the battery compartement.

Reviews.Title: Who's the Dummy
Reviews.Author: Robert Cavazos
Reviews.Content: If your stupid enough to break in to a home that may potentially have cameras installed, you deserve what you get.  The path of least resistance applies here.  Is it real, or not?  What dummy would stick around to find out, there are plenty of homes without surveillance.  Move on Mr.  Stick around & you'll discover that my gun is not a fake.

Reviews.Title: Big battery drainer
Reviews.Author: EddieZ
Reviews.Content: This camera works fine and looks real enough, but it drains the battery very fast. I had to replace the batteries within about 6 weeks. I am shocked that an LED light would use that much power.  I may just end up leaving it without the light flashing.

Reviews.Title: Nice but too big.
Reviews.Author: yusseff
Reviews.Content: It is very real and can scare anyone see you are recording but the detail I see is that is very large and the light that flashes too bright. It would be more credible if it was small and light but more subdued.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality for a Fake Camera...
Reviews.Author: Christian Veron "Christian"
Reviews.Content: Great Quality for a Fake Camera... Its the best dummy for work whit many people... The diference within real and fake its "0"

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made. Can't turn it off.
Reviews.Author: Margit Jones "maggie"
Reviews.Content: Looks alright and could maybe fool someone in the dark (which would be fine) but it runs on batteries and there's not way to turn it on/off. It runs as long as the batteries hold. Kind of beside the point since those cams are installed some place out of reach. $9 waisted.

Reviews.Title: Kindda look like a surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: Rod S
Reviews.Content: I think the quality is not the best, but what can you expect for such a low price? It does look like a real camera.

Reviews.Title: Small dummy camera
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: It's ok, small black little camera.  The sticker is completely useless.  But it certainly gets attention.  My friends came over and thought I was videotaping them as they walked up my doorstep.  lol  So I guess it works.  At least it makes a person think twice.

Reviews.Title: Cheesy
Reviews.Author: Pokey "Pokey"
Reviews.Content: I knew I wasn't getting a high quality fake here, but I expected a basic measure of quality. This item is so poorly made, it won't even keep the batteries in place, so the fake red light - which provides authenticity - doesn't even come on. A waste of time and money.

Reviews.Title: It borders on looking real and looking fake.
Reviews.Author: Arbie Fuentez
Reviews.Content: I guess it does its purpose right now until we get a real security system we can afford. It will make a potential intruder to think twice.

Reviews.Title: The dummy cam shipped was a Dome Type and NOT the one PICTURED HERE
Reviews.Author: William B. Heuring "wheuring"
Reviews.Content: The dummy cam shipped was a Dome Type and NOT the one PICTURED HERE, I returned the wrong (3) ones and reordered them I hope they get it right the 2nd time.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre
Reviews.Author: DCist
Reviews.Content: This produce looks cheap and feels cheap in person. I'm not certain it is worth its asking price at the moment.

ProductInfo.Features:
Dummy simulated dome security camera increases your security at a fraction of the cost of real camera, deters possible thieves and intruders
Build-in blinking light and 20 pcs fake IR LEDs
Staff & thieves will never know it is a dummy
Can be mounted on wall or ceiling using the included screws
Power requires: 2 x AA batteries (Not Included). Free security warning sticker included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Dome Dummy Fake Infrared IR CCTV Surveillance Security Camera Imitation Simulated Blinking LED with Security Warning Sticker AA3
